title: Interim Blue
description: Magic and malice abound in the land of Faerie.A dark twist on faeries.For Shade, a chance meeting with a powerful Teleen faery warrior who wields electrical currents and blue fires along his skin, has her joining him on a treacherous mission for the good Seelie Faerie Court across the land of Faerie. Paperback includes the prequel: Evangeline.
author: Alexia Purdy
